info.title: Forum API
info.description: This is a specification for forum API

get.summary: Get all messages in a forum by id forum

post.summary: Create a message in a forum by id forum

put.summary: Edit a message in a forum by id forum and id message

delete.summary: Delete a message in a forum by id forum and id message

post.summary: Report a message in a forum by id forum and id message
